page.title: 11Entertainment
page.content: {The Village Fete} The village fete takes place every year. It is in the street or in a field. This year there is a coconut shy and a cake stall, a band and lots of other things. Sir Edward Du Cann is going to open the fete. {The Beating of the Bounds} The beating of the bounds takes place on special occasions. Lots of people from the parish walk 7\ miles around the parish boundaries. {Youth Club} Our Youth Club is held every 2 weeks. It starts at 7 p.m. For juniors it ends at 8.30 and for seniors it ends at 10. The Youth Club Leader is Mrs Paterson and she is very nice and lots of fun. Since it started in Feb. l984 it has raised about Â£550. At Christmas we went carol singing for the blind.
